body:
This week’s miniepisode finds Prudence visited by Emily VanDerWerff, critic at large for Vox. VanDerWerff is the co-creator of the fiction podcast Arden and co-author of the book Monsters of the Week: The Complete Critical Companion to The X-Files.

Prudie and VanDerWerff discuss a letter writer who’s holding the secret that her deceased brother had a long-term affair with his ex-wife while married with a new child, what to do when your mom keeps delaying the ceremony for your dad’s ashes, and what to consider after finding out that private texts you sent to your friend are also read by her husband.

title: My friend’s husband reads all of our private texts: Dear Prudence podcast.
